title: How should a great K8s distro feel? Try the new Canonical Kubernetes, now in beta | Ubuntu
author: Marcin Stożek
description: Try the new Canonical Kubernetes beta, our new distribution that combines ZeroOps for small clusters and intelligent automation for larger production environments that also want to benefit from the latest community innovations […]
cntitle: 优秀的 K8s 发行版应具备哪些特性？试用新的 Canonical Kubernetes，现已进入测试阶段 | Ubuntu
cndescription: 试试新的 Canonical Kubernetes 测试版，我们的新发行版将小型集群的 ZeroOps 与大型生产环境的智能自动化相结合，这些环境也希望从最新的社区创新中受益 […]
